name: BlenderToy v.0.01
description:
This is part of the "Build A Toy First" project course by Prof Csongor Baranyai at The University of Applied Sciences Europe - Game Design - Art B.A.

"It is often said in game development, that you should build the toy first, before further develop it into a game. This is not just essential to have a better game/ toy, but also a better and organic development process. The designer should take a playful position towards her own game, so she can explore its emergent/ inherent possibilities through wild experimentation. Unfortunately that’s easier said than done. ..." - https://gamedesignue.itch.io/

Is a blender a toy? The playfulness lies rather with the possible combinations. This ToyTest is still in progress, it is here to show the development (within one week).

It should be mentioned that the mixing Behaviour still has to be done, therefor I think the most fun part here is still yet to come. 

This Toytest is part of the Team:

Anna: https://ivyaevi.itch.io/

Benjamin: https://benjamin-rose.itch.io/

Mylène: https://myllenium-mylene.itch.io/

This is the second week of our project course. To come is; two more weeks of Testing-phase, A Sandbox phase and a Polishing phase. 

Stay Tuned,
